Text: EMAIL ADDRESS LIST FOR MARKET NOTIFICATION OF OPERATING CONDITIO NSERCOT MARKET PARTICIPANTS ERCOT is considering setting up a special email exploder address list to use as supplemental notification to registered participants in the ERCOT market when Special Operating Condititons Advisories Alerts and Emergency Operations Procedures are implemented and posted on the SAMIS OASIS If you are a verifiable participant in the ERCOT market and would like to be included in this list please notify John Tolbert Smith by November It is important that we have an address that will likely be stable and not often changed To assist us in processing your reply you must set the subject of your responce to MARKET EMAIL to be included in this list
